name: Classic Bead Bracelet
description: A classic bracelet template for custom bead arrangements with text support
svg_template: <svg viewBox="0 0 400 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><defs><pattern id="braceletPattern" x="0" y="0" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse"><circle cx="10" cy="10" r="8" fill="none" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/></pattern></defs><rect x="20" y="30" width="360" height="40" fill="url(#braceletPattern)" stroke="#ccc" stroke-width="1" rx="20"/><text x="200" y="20" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12" fill="#666">Custom Bracelet Design</text></svg>
